room_title: Escape room "Tiger Island" by Amelia Island Escape Rooms in Jacksonville
review: My family of four really enjoyed this themed escape. We completed it in about 37 minutes. The puzzles were a bit challenging - an easy/medium challenge level room. A great time with an extremely nice staff! Highly recommend 10/10.

room_title: Escape room "Tiger Island" by Amelia Island Escape Rooms in Jacksonville
review: We've completed the tiger island and the 80's escape room and both were a blast! The staff is always super friendly and helpful. The puzzles are challenging, fun, and rewarding. Definitely reccomend this to anyone looking for an adventure!

room_title: Escape room "Tiger Island" by Amelia Island Escape Rooms in Jacksonville
review: While visiting Amelia Island for a week we did two escape rooms with our children, ages 7 and 9. We liked “Unlock the 80s” so much we returned to do “Tiger Island.” Both we’re challenging and super fun. We escaped both times! Will definitely come do this again on our next trip to Amelia Island!
